Strings.Text: It's a reception desk. It appears \nthat nobody has sat here for a {pause}{clear}very long time.{pause}
The roof is destroyed and the \nsteel frame is bent. The door is {pause}{clear}blocked. You can't go this way.{pause}
The 3rd Energy development \nproject symbol is on the flag.{pause}
The 3rd Energy development \nproject symbol is on the flag.{pause}

The 3rd Energy development \nproject symbol and the facility {pause}{clear}name is carved into it.{pause}{clear}“3rd Energy Research & \nDevelopment City, Edward City, {pause}{clear}Military Facility”{pause}
There is something on the desk \ncovered with dust.{pause}{clear}You have found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
